name: Spoopy House, a HTML5 Zine
description:
Made for InspireJam.

This a one-page HTML5 zine, here is the NeoCities Mirror if you prefer. 

The main inspiration was Yesterweb Zine: Hall-O-Zine Edition. Which is also a zine in HTML form.

If this or the Yesterweb zine inspires you to make your own HTML zine, let me know, I'd love to check it out.
